assignments.description: For ProServe Advisory, A&E, CND, DS&E, ERP
assignments.name: ProServ_Approval_Defaults
assignments.label: ProServ Approval Defaults

assignments.description: For all sub practices and 'Fully Partner Delivered' equals true.
assignments.name: ProServ_Approval_Defaults_0
assignments.label: Fully Partner Delivered Approval Defaults

assignments.description: For ProServe ERP, ERP-MSP, Productivity MSFT, Digital No Finance and Legal Approvers
assignments.name: ProServ_Approval_Defaults_No_Finance_and_Legal
assignments.label: ProServ Approval Defaults (No Finance and Legal)

rules.name: BU_Proserv
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 8 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: BU - Proserv

decisions.description: ProServ ERP, ERP-MSP, Productivity MSFT, Digital, Security do not need finance and legal approval
decisions.name: Finance_and_Legal_Required
decisions.label: Finance and Legal Required?

rules.name: ProServ_Finance_and_Legal_Required
rules.conditionLogic: 7 OR (1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 8))
rules.label: ProServ Finance and Legal Required

rules.name: ProServ_Finance_and_Legal_NOT_Required
rules.label: ProServ Finance and Legal NOT Required

rules.name: ProServ
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 7 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 8)
rules.label: ProServ

Flow.description: -No finance or legal for Sub Practice-Erp & Productivity-MSFT -Security remains in Finance and Legal required.

formulas.name: buApprover
formulas.expression: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL({!sovOpp.Onica_BU_Practice__c} ,"Productivity MSFT" ), OR(ISPICKVAL({!sovOpp.Onica_Type__c}, "PSO"),ISPICKVAL({!sovOpp.Type}, "Professional Services"))), "00561000001zt2gAAA", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL({!sovOpp.Onica_BU_Practice__c} ,"Delivery Lead Growth (GTS)" ), OR(ISPICKVAL({!sovOpp.Onica_Type__c}, "PSO"),ISPICKVAL({!sovOpp.Type}, "Professional Services"))), "00561000003Ck7K", "0053f000000pG2CAAU"))

Flow.label: Resubmit for Approval

loops.name: Loop_to_Get_Approval_Legal_Review
loops.label: Loop to Get Approval Legal Review

recordCreates.name: Create_Content_Document_Link_Negotiate_Legal_Review
recordCreates.label: Create Content Document Link Negotiate Legal Review

fields.name: CurrentlyInReview
fields.fieldText: This Approval is currently in Review and cannot be changed.

fields.name: CurrentlyLegalInReview
fields.fieldText: This Approval is currently in Review and cannot be changed.

fields.name: NotRequiredType
fields.fieldText: Please review: Opportunity Type is incorrect or Onica Type is null.

validationRule.errorMessage: Comments must be less than or equal to 1,000 characters.
Comments must be less than or equal to 1,000 characters.

fields.name: NotReadyForResubmission
fields.fieldText: You cannot re-submit this Approval at this time. Please check with the Approvers to ensure that it is ok to re-submit for Approval. If you still receive this error, please contact your system administrator.

fields.name: No
fields.fieldText: The Document needs to be uploaded.

validationRule.errorMessage: Initial comments must be less than or equal to 1,000 characters.

fields.name: SignatureProcess
fields.fieldText: This Approval cannot be resubmitted as it is in the Signature Process.

fields.name: TooManyRecordsFound
fields.fieldText: Too many Approval Items were found. Please advise the system admin that there were multiple Approval Items in the Rejected Status for the Approval {!sovApproval.Name}.

fields.name: Yes
fields.fieldText: The Document has been uploaded.

fields.name: YesDocUploaded
fields.fieldText: The Document has been uploaded.
